Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError exception is raised when attempting to create a
        Pie Certificate object from a core Certificate object with an
        unsupported certificate type.
        """
core_cert = secrets.Certificate(enums.CertificateType.PGP, self.
    certificate_bytes)
args = core_cert,
self.assertRaises(TypeError, self.factory._build_pie_certificate, *args)
